sample_rows.Title: AI-derived annotations for the NLST and NSCLC-Radiomics computed tomography imaging collections
sample_rows.AnalysisArtifactsonTCIA: Organ segmentations, slice-level qualitative annotations, shape radiomics features
sample_rows.Description:
Public imaging datasets are critical for the development and evaluation of automated tools in cancer imaging. Unfortunately, many of the available datasets do not provide annotations of tumors or  organs-at-risk, crucial for the assessment of these tools. This is due to the fact that annotation of medical images is time consuming and requires domain expertise. It has been demonstrated that artificial intelligence (AI) based annotation tools can achieve acceptable performance and thus can be used to automate the annotation of large datasets. As part of the effort to enrich the public data available within NCI Imaging Data Commons (IDC) (https://imaging.datacommons.cancer.gov/) [1], we introduce this dataset that consists of such AI-generated annotations for two publicly available medical imaging collections of Computed Tomography (CT) images of the chest.

Please see the nnU-Net-BPR-annotations wiki page to learn more about the images and to obtain any supporting metadata for this collection.

sample_rows.Title: Standardized representation of the TCIA LIDC-IDRI annotations using DICOM
sample_rows.Description:
This dataset contains standardized DICOM representation of the volumetric nodule annotations and characterizations collected by the LIDC/IDRI initiative.

Please see the DICOM-LIDC-IDRI-Nodules wiki page to learn more about the images and to obtain any supporting metadata for this collection.

sample_rows.Title: RIDER Lung CT Segmentation Labels from: Decoding tumour phenotype by noninvasive imaging using a quantitative radiomics approach
sample_rows.Description:
This collection contains manual and automatic segmentations of the gross tumor volume for the RIDER Lung CT collection.

Please see the RIDER-LungCT-Seg wiki page to learn more about the images and to obtain any supporting metadata for this collection.

sample_rows.Title: QIN multi-site collection of Lung CT data with Nodule Segmentations
sample_rows.Description:
This collection contains lung nodule segmentations obtained using segmentation tools that participated in the QIN challenge “moist run” initiative.

Please see the QIN-LungCT-Seg wiki page to learn more about the images and to obtain any supporting metadata for this collection.

sample_rows.Title: DICOM SR of clinical data and measurement for breast cancer collections to TCIA
sample_rows.AnalysisArtifactsonTCIA: DICOM SR descriptions of patient characteristics, histopathology, receptor status and clinical findings including measurements.
sample_rows.Description:
This collection contains clinical metadata corresponding to several breast imaging collections harmonized into DICOM SR representation, generated by the Data Integration & Imaging Informatics (DI-Cubed) project.

Please see the DICOM-SR-Breast-Clinical wiki page to learn more about the images and to obtain any supporting metadata for this collection.
